group_1.textRight: You are Kokoro Awane and...
Masara Kagami.

group_1.textLeft: This is Meiyui Chun.

group_1.textRight: Just Meiyui is fine.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, um, nice to meet you.
Hello...

group_1.textRight: You saw right through her, Nanaka.
That Magical Girl, Suzune.

group_1.textLeft: Yes. I used my magic.

group_1.textRight: What do you mean?
Doesn't your magic allow you to sense@the target of your revenge?

group_1.textLeft: That is correct...
But I can also sense when similar, related@problems rear their heads.
Whatever is linked to my vengeance. That@includes anything that gets in my way.

group_1.textRight: Ah, so she could've eventually got in@the way of your goals. Yes, I understand.

group_1.textLeft: Vengeance?

group_1.textRight: Ah, you don't know about that. We can@discuss it later.
For now, I must ask...
Was she really attempting to kill you?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, there's no doubt about it.
Every attack she made was really vicious,@and she was aiming for my throat each time.

group_1.textRight: I went invisible and moved in close to her,@hoping for a chance to attack...
But I could only manage to assist Kokoro.

group_1.textLeft: Plus, I got this strange feeling from@her... A foreboding, scary feeling.
You know, like someone out for blood.

group_1.textRight: And you have no idea why?

group_1.textLeft: Nope.
That's why Masara and I thought we should@try to ask why she did it.
And that was why you went looking for@the nearest Witch.

group_1.textRight: It was the only way we could think of to@find her.

group_1.textLeft: Now that I've heard your story, I think you@were on the right track.
She's killing Magical Girls who hunt down@Witches.
That appears to be her basic goal.

group_1.textRight: What are you gonna do about her, Nanaka?
That's why you called Meiyui here, right?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, it is.
I have no idea why she is targeting Magical@Girls.
But she clearly poses a great threat to us.@She is our enemy.

group_1.textRight: A fair point.
I see what you're saying. She's like an @evil shooting star.

group_1.textLeft: We must remove all obstacles in our path.
If not, we will undoubtedly suffer the@consequences.
In a sense, Suzune is...
...a "disaster" for the city.

group_1.textRight: So basically...she's like a Witch.

group_1.textLeft: Indeed.

group_1.textRight: Maybe so.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah.

group_1.textRight: *Sigh*
I wish I could try getting through to her@again.

group_1.textLeft: Akira, this may just be my opinion, but...
I do not believe you will make much progress@by trying to talk with that girl.
There was a fearsome determination in her@eyes.
If we give her even the slightest opening,@who knows what she might do.

group_1.textRight: I get that.
But if I only had a little time, just enough@to ask her a question.
Please, give me a chance to talk to her.

group_1.textLeft: And if she refuses to listen?

group_1.textRight: Then I'll take her on with everything I've@got.

group_1.textLeft: ...All right.
Kokoro and Masara, what do you think?
Do you also wish to ask her why she attacked@you?

group_1.textRight: Let's drop it, Kokoro.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...
Above all else, we have to keep ourselves@safe...
...And this is a really dangerous @situation...

group_1.textRight: Are you going to be all right?

group_1.textLeft: Uh, yeah! I just need to gather myself.

group_1.textRight: Okay, so do you have a strategy in mind?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I do.
My plan involves the three of us who are@already acquainted with her.
Kokoro.
Akira.
And myself.
Meiyui, I will need you on board to make@this work.

group_1.textRight: Yes, understood.

group_1.textLeft: I will also need...
...you, Masara.

group_1.textRight: What do I need to do?

group_1.textLeft: Your job will be...
